title: The inside scoop on ice cream innovation
description: It is one of our favourite treats, but just what really goes into getting ice cream onto your cone?

title: Twitter gives in to user requests for edit button
description: It is testing the feature among staff and will roll it out in the coming weeks to Twitter Blue subscribers.

title: Hackers target politicians with fake news website
description: The Australian government is among those targeted by the hackers, according to Proofpoint.

title: Microsoft Activision deal could lessen competition, UK watchdog finds
description: The $69bn takeover of the Call of Duty maker may now be investigated in-depth by a UK watchdog.

title: US chip makers hit by new China export rule
description: Nvidia says two of its top computer chips were affected by a new licence requirement for exporting to China.
